snippet: The debt-adjustment plan will allow downtrodden Central Falls, R.I., to emerge from bankruptcy after a little more than a year.
abstract: United States Bankruptcy Court Judge Frank J Baily paves the way for Central Falls, RI, to emerge from bankruptcy by signing off on a debt-adjustment plan a little more than a year after the downtrodden city entered court protection; plan, which raises taxes and cuts pensions and employee benefits, represents blistering cutbacks for many residents.
lead_paragraph: The debt-adjustment plan will allow downtrodden Central Falls, R.I., to emerge from bankruptcy after a little more than a year.

headline.seo: Central Falls, R.I., to Emerge From Bankruptcy
headline.main: Plan to End Bankruptcy in Rhode Island City Gains Approval
headline.print_headline: Plan to End Bankruptcy in Rhode Island City Gains Approval
